word_mean: 转录本：以另一股核酸为模板合成的一股核酸
又称“转录本”。在DNA模板上由RNA聚合酶催化转录生成的mRNA。

list.abs: 转录因子(transcription factor)是起正调控作用的反式作用因子。转录因子是转录起始过程中RNA聚合酶所需的辅助因子。

反转录（reverse transcription）是以RNA为模板，由反转录酶催化dNTP合成DNA，又称逆转录或RNA指导的DNA合成。1970年Temin …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French transcrit, from Latin transcriptum, neuter past participle of transcribere (see transcribe). The spelling change in the 15th cent. was due to association with the Latin

entry.tran: (根据录音或笔记整理的)笔录本，文字本，转写本
entry.def: A transcript of a conversation or speech is a written text of it, based on a recording or notes.

example.ex: They wouldn't let me have a transcript of the interview.
example.tran: 他们拒绝给我一份采访的文字整理稿。

means.word_mean: 1. something that has been transcribed; a written record (usually typewritten) of dictated or recorded speech;

sentences.sentence: "he read a transcript of the interrogation"
"you can obtain a transcript of this radio program by sending a self-addressed envelope to the station"

means.word_mean: 2. a reproduction of a written record (e.g. of a legal or school record)
